entities.name: minerva mcgonagall
entities.description: Minerva McGonagall is introduced as the Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts School. She signs a letter to Harry Potter on behalf of Albus Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Minerva McGonagall sent a letter to Harry Potter, which is mentioned in the text as 'your owl'.
Hagrid informed Albus Dumbledore about giving Harry his letter and taking him to buy things tomorrow, as mentioned in the note he wrote.
